document.docAuthor: Qi, Bao-Ying, Schaefer, Carl W. & Xiu-Hua, Lü
document.masterDocTitle: Additions to the mirid (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) fauna of China, 2000 – 2006

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Additions to the mirid (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) fauna of China, 2000 – 2006

paragraph.bibRef:
Zheng, Lü , Liu & Xu
2004
:
68–72
(key to Chinese genera) .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Adelphocoris Reuter, 1896
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 73–75 (key to Chinese species).

Adelphocoris luridus Reuter, 1906
; Zheng,Lü,Liu,Xu, 2004 : 91 (redescription, phallus and parameres, distribution, BJ, SAX , GS , SC , YN ). Host plant unknown.

=
Adelphocoris yunnanensis Zheng & Li 1990
, syn. by Zheng,Lü,Liu,Xu, 2004 : 91,730 .

Adelphocoris medialis Zheng 2004
in Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 92–93, 730 – 731 , fig. 12 k (nov. spec.
description; distribution; body. Holotype ɗ, GS . Deposited in IZAS ). Host plant unknown.
Agenis Distant 1904

Agenis incisuratus (Walker 1873 ); Zheng & Lü 2002 : 505 (nov. record; distribution. Examined specimens 1 ɗ,HN; 2 ɗ ɗ 4 ΨΨ, YN ; 1 Ψ,TW. Deposited separately in DBNU , NMNS , and BIM ). Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 205–206 , pl.
III- 7
(redescription; distribution). Host plant unknown.

Allorhinocoris Reuter 1876
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 120 (key to Chinese species).

Allorhinocoris splendidus Zheng 2004
in Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 122–123, 731 – 732 , fig. 23 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; dorsal view of pronotum; genital segment. Holotype ɗ, SC . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

Allorhinocoris virescens (Poppius, 1915 )
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 123–124,732 (nov. record; distribution; distribution. Examined specimens 8 ɗ ɗ 7 ΨΨ, SC . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

Apolygopsis Yasunaga
in Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 3–4 (nov. gen.; description; type species:
Apolygopsis furvocarinatus Yasunaga 2002
); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 124–125 (brief redescription; key to Chinese species).

Apolygopsis elegans (Zheng & Wang, 1983 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 4 (nov. comb.; brief discussion); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 125–127 , figs. 24 a–g, pl.
II– 2
(redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures. Examined specimens: holotype and allotype of
Lygus (Apolygus) elegans
, HN). Host plants unknown.

Apolygopsis emeia (Zheng & Wang, 1983 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 4 (nov. comb.; brief discussion); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 127–129 , figs. 25 a–g (redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures. Examined specimens: holotype , allotype and paratypes of
Lygus (Apolygus) emeia
, FJ , SC ). Host plants unknown.

Apolygopsis mosaicus (Zheng & Wang, 1983 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 4 (nov. comb.; brief discussion); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 129–131 , figs. 26 a–g, pl.
II- 9
(redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures. Examined specimens: holotype , allotype and paratypes of
Lygus (Apolygus) mosaicus
, GD ). Host plants unknown.

Apolygopsis nigritulus (Linnavuori, 1961 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 6–7 , figs. 8–13, 15 – 16 (nov. comb.; male and female genitalic structures; SEM picture of head; diagnosis; discussion. Examined specimens: 10 ɗ ɗ 15 ΨΨ, HUB . Deposited in CAS ); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 131–133 , figs. 27 a–h (redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures; distribution. FJ , GD , GX , GZ , HUB , HUN , SC , YN , ZJ ). Host plants:
Boehmeria spicata (Thunb.)
and
Urtica
sp. ( Urticaceae ) (Yasunaga, 1992 ).

Apolygopsis picturatus (Zheng & Wang, 1983 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 4 (nov. comb.; brief discussion); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 133–135 , figs. 28 a–g, (redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures. Examined specimens: holotype , allotype and paratypes of
Lygus (Apolygus) picturatus
, FJ , GX ). Host plants unknown.

Apolygopsis yunnananus (Zheng & Wang, 1983 )
; Yasunaga, Schwartz & Chérot 2002 : 4 (nov. comb.; brief discussion); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 135–137 , figs. 29 a–g, (redescription; vesica and parameres in different views; female genitalic structures. Examined specimens: holotype of
Lygus (Apolygus) yunnananus
, YN ). Host plants unknown.

Apolygus
China 1941 ; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 138–140 (key to Chinese species).

Apolygus pulchellus (Reuter, 1906 )
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 168–170,732 , fig. 45 , pl.
III– 1
(description; distribution; vesica; parameres in different views; female genitalia. Examined specimens: holotype of
Lygus ( Apolygus ) fujianensis
, ɗ, ZJ ; others: FJ , SC , GZ , SAX , GS . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

=
Apolygus fujianensis (Wang & Zheng, 1982 )
(syn. by Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 168 ).

Apolygus evonymi (Zheng & Wang 1982 ) Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 147
–149,732, fig. 34 (=
Apolygus liaoningensis (Lü & Zheng 1996 )
syn. nov. ; description; distribution; vesica; parameres in different views; female genitalia. Examined specimens: holotype of
Lygocoris ( Apolygus ) evonymi
, ɗ, SAX ; others: SAX , LN. Deposited in DBNU . Host plant:
Chorisia speciosa
( Bombacaceae ) and
Euonymus
sp. ( Celastraceae )).

Bertsa Kirkaldy 1904
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 206 (key to Chinese species).

Bertsa major Zheng, 2004
in Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 207–208, 732 – 733 , figs. 66 a–d, plate
III- 8
(nov. spec. description; distribution; parameres and vesica in different views. Holotype ɗ, HN, paratype 3 ɗ ɗ 2 ΨΨ, HN, 1 Ψ, ZJ , 3 ΨΨ, FJ , 3 ɗ ɗ 3 ΨΨ, YN . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

Brachycoleus decolor Reuter 1887
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 209–210,734 (nov. record; distribution. Examined specimens 2 ΨΨ, XJ. Deposited separately in DBNU , NMNS and BIM ). Host plant unknown.

; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 216–217 (key to Chinese species).

Castanopsides hasegawai Yasunaga 1992
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 219–220,734 (nov. record; distribution. Examined specimens 2 ɗ ɗ, TW; 1 Ψ, HUB . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 237–238 (key to Chinese species).

Cheilocapsus maculipes Liu & Wang 2001 : 62
–63, figs. 1–3 (nov. spec. description; distribution; vesica, and parameres in different views. Holotype ɗ, HEN , paratype 4 ɗ ɗ 1 Ψ, HEN . Deposited in DBNU ); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 (rdescription,vesica, and parameres, distribution). Host plant unknown.

Cheilocapsus nigrescens Liu & Wang 2001 : 63
, figs. 4–6 (nov. spec. description; distribution; vesica and parameres in different views. Holotype ɗ, SAX , paratypes 32 ɗ ɗ 11 ΨΨ, SAX ; 4 ɗ ɗ 1 Ψ, HEN . Deposited separately in IZAS and DBNU ); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 239–241 , figs 72 a–f (description,vesica and parameres, distribution). Host plant unknown.

; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 243–244 (key to Chinese species).

Chilocrates chelonia (Distant, 1904 )
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 244,734 (nov. record; distribution; distribution. Examined specimens 10 ɗ ɗ 2 ΨΨ, XZ . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

Chilocrates yangi Zheng 2004
in Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 246–247, 734 – 735 , fig. 73 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; vesica and parameres in different views; genital segment. Holotype ɗ, ZJ , paratype 1 Ψ, ZJ . Deposited DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

Creontiades Distant 1883
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 249–250 (key to Chinese species).

Creontiades bipunctatus Poppius 1915
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 250–251,735 (=
Creontiades gossypii Hsiao & Meng 1963
syn. nov. ; description; distribution. Examined specimens: holotype of
Creontiades bipunctatus
, ɗ, deposited in DEIC ; holotype of
Creontiades gossypii
, ɗ, JX , deposited in IZAS ; others: JX , SC , YN . Deposited in DBNU . Host plant:
Gossypium sp
. ( Malvaceae )).

; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 342–343 (key to Chinese species).

; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 348–349 (redescription, distribution. Examined specimens: holotype of
Lygus alashanensis
, ɗ, IM; others: GS , IM, NX ). Host plant unknown.

= Lygus alashanensis
Qi & Nonnaizab 1983 (syn. by Aglyamzyanov 2002 : 326 ).

Lygus poluensis (Wagner 1967 )
; Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 356–357 (redescription, dorsal view of body, phallus and parameres in different views, distribution. Examined specimens: holotype of
Lygus poluensis
, ɗ, XJ; others: IM, QH, XZ ). Host plant unknown.

= Lygus renati
Schwartz 1998 (syn. by Aglyamzyanov 2005 : 76 ).

Lygus punctatus (Zetterstedt, 1838 )

Lygus kerzhneri
, ɗ, IM; others: HEB , HEN , HLJ , JL , NX , SC , XZ ). Host plant unknown.

= Lygus kerzhneri
Qi & Nonnaizab 1993 (syn. by Aglyamzyanov 2002 : 236 )

(nov. nom. for
Phytocoris desertorum Nonnaizab & Jorigtoo 1992
); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 489–491,761 , figs. 181 a–f (redescription; distribution; vesica and parameres; head. Examined specimens: holotype and paratypes of

= Phytocoris macer Xu & Zheng 1997 (syn. by Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 489,491 ).

–779, figs. 1–9 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of pronotum; vesica and parameres in different views. Holotype ɗ, SC , paratype 1 Ψ, SC . Deposited in DBIMNU. Host plant unknown.

–192, fig. 2 (nov. spec. description; distribution; vesica and parameres in different views. Holotype , ɗ, YN , paratypes 1 ɗ 1 Ψ, YN . Deposited in DBNU ); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 494–495 , figs. 184 a–e (redescription, phallus and parameres, distribution). Host plant unknown.

Phytocoris longissimus Xu & Zheng 2002 : 193
–194, fig. 3 (nov. spec. description; distribution; vesica and parameres in different views. Holotype , ɗ, SC , paratypes 2 ɗ ɗ, SC . Deposited in DBNU ); Zheng, Lü, Liu & Xu 2004 : 497–499 , figs. 186 a–i (redescription, phallus and parameres, distribution). Host plant unknown.

Phytocoris loriae Poppius 1914
